tags.name: AdminEmailTemplatesRestService
tags.description: REST service for the email configuration page.

tags.name: AdminFrontendRestService
tags.description:
Service for frontend-related data.
Loads all data in background and prepares it for FE for optimization - from browser it's more expensive to load it.

tags.name: AdminPapersRestService
tags.description: Service to work with Admin papers (Help&Service html templates).

tags.name: AdminSystemInfoPublicRestService
tags.description: Rest service - provide system information without rights restrictions.

tags.name: BoardRestService
tags.description: Service which manages Dashboard module boards.

tags.name: BoardUserActionsRestService
tags.description:
Service to save some user actions over board objects.
E.g. used for storing the information about discarded "to do" Job Manager items.

tags.name: BoardWidgetRestService
tags.description:
Provides information about Dashboard widgets metadata.
It describes the properties of all existing widgets.
It's does not describe exact instances of widgets for users. For instances see BoardWidgetInstanceRestService.

tags.name: HelpInfoRestService
tags.description: Service to work with Help&Service links.

tags.name: MaintenanceRestService
tags.description: REST service for the maintenance message.
